title: WTB: Large collection of baseball cards.....still looking!  :)
author: jimivintage

posts.post_title: WTB: Large collection of baseball cards.....still looking!  :)
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I'm looking to purchase a large collection of cards.  Sets, starter sets, HOFers, stars, PSA/SGC/BVG or ungraded are all fine.  Topps, Fleer, Bowman, Goudey, T206....whatever!  I'm kind of getting a feel of what's out there.  :)

Thanks so much, and looking forward to hearing from you!

Jimi
Still stalking your collections...  :)  Anyone have bulk to sell?
